rule.ID: Visible Rule Check Report Type is Adjustment
Visible Rule For IBS Detail Creation
Visible Rule Report Status is Posted
Visible Rule Report status is review or ready to post

item.ID: Visible Rule Check Report Type is Adjustment
Visible Rule Report Status is Posted
Visible Rule Report status is review or ready to post
Visible Rule For IBS Detail Creation

query.sfwSql: select * from dbo.SGT_IBS_HEADER

select pa.*,p.*,pl.*,pag.*,pal.*,pape.* from sgt_person_account pa WITH (NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID inner join sgt_person p WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_id= p.person_id inner join sgt_plan pl WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.plan_id = pl.plan_id left join ( Select PAG.* from sgt_person_account_ghdv pag(nolock) INNER jOIN sgt_person_account_ghdv_history pagh with(nolock) on pag.person_account_ghdv_id = pagh.person_account_ghdv_id where pagh.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2' AND ( ((pagh.dental_insurance_type_value is null OR pagh.dental_insurance_type_value = 'RT16') AND (pagh.health_insurance_type_value is null OR pagh.health_insurance_type_value in('RT09','RT12')) AND (pagh.vision_insurance_type_value is null OR pagh.vision_insurance_type_value ='RETR')) OR pagh.cobra_type_value is not null) AND @batchDate between pagh.start_date and isnull(pagh.end_date,'01/01/2900') AND pagh.START_DATE <> CASE WHEN pagh.END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN pagh.END_DATE ELSE '01/01/2900' END ) pag ON pag.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id left join ( Select Pal.* from sgt_person_account_life pal(nolock) Inner join sgt_person_account_life_history palh with(nolock) on pal.person_account_id = palh.person_account_id and palh.level_of_coverage_value = 'BASC' where palh.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2' and palh.life_insurance_type_value = 'REME' and @batchDate between palh.effective_start_date and isnull(palh.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') AND palh.effective_start_date <> CASE WHEN palh.effective_end_date IS NOT NULL THEN palh.effective_end_date ELSE '01/01/2900' END ) pal on pal.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id where pl.benefit_type_value='INSR' AND (Pag.person_account_id is not null or Pal.person_account_id is not null) and (pa.end_date IS NULL OR pa.end_date >= @batchDate) and (ibs_flag = 'Y' or ibs_supplemental_flag = 'Y') and ((pa.plan_id in (9,12,16,17) AND (ibs_org_id IS NULL or (pa.plan_id in (9,12) and ibs_org_id is not null and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) > 0 and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) < 100)) AND ibs_supplemental_org_id IS NULL) OR (pa.plan_id = 13)) order by pa.person_id

SELECT COV_REF.* FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE RATE INNER JOIN SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF COV_REF ON COV_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF_ID=RATE.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF RATE_REF ON COV_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF_ID=RATE_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF_ID WHERE RATE.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF_ID=@RefID

Select A.* from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A inner join SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION B on a.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=b.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID inner join SGT_PERSON C on A.person_id=C.person_id INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV D ON A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = D.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID where A.plan_id = 9 and IBS_FLAG='Y'

SELECT C.PERSON_ID as PERSLinkID, C.FIRST_NAME as FirstName, C.LAST_NAME as LastName,A.JS_RHIC_AMOUNT as RHICAmount, A.* FROM SGT_IBS_DETAIL A INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON C ON C.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND ISNULL(A.DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE, '') <> 'IGNR' WHERE A.PLAN_ID = 12 and isnull(A.JS_RHIC_AMOUNT,0) <> 0 ORDER BY C.LAST_NAME,C.FIRST_NAME --PROD PIR 5762

DECLARE @IBSDATE DATETIME DECLARE @IBS_HEADER_ID INT SELECT @IBS_HEADER_ID = MAX(IBS_HEADER_ID), @IBSDATE = MAX(BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR) FROM SGT_IBS_HEADER WHERE REPORT_TYPE_VALUE = 'REG'
SELECT C.PERSON_ID AS Person_ID, C.FIRST_NAME AS First_Name,C.LAST_NAME AS Last_Name, SUM(ISNULL(APPLIEDRHICAMOUNT,0)) AS APPLIEDRHICAmount, SUM(ISNULL(RHIC_AMOUNT,0)) AS RHIC_Amount FROM ( SELECT A.PERSON_ID AS PERSON_ID, SUM(A.OTHR_RHIC_AMOUNT) AS APPLIEDRHICAMOUNT, 0 AS RHIC_AMOUNT FROM SGT_IBS_DETAIL A WHERE A.PLAN_ID IN(12,9) AND ISNULL(A.DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE, '') <> 'IGNR' AND ISNULL(A.OTHR_RHIC_AMOUNT,0) <> 0 AND IBS_HEADER_ID = @IBS_HEADER_ID GROUP BY A.PERSON_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT RC.PERSON_ID AS PERSON_ID, 0 AS APPLIEDRHICAMOUNT, SUM(RC.COMBINED_RHIC_AMOUNT) AS RHIC_AMOUNT FROM SGT_BENEFIT_RHIC_COMBINE RC WHERE ISNULL(RC.COMBINED_RHIC_AMOUNT,0) <> 0 AND @IBSDATE BETWEEN RC.START_DATE AND CASE WHEN RC.END_DATE IS NULL THEN '99991231' ELSE RC.END_DATE END AND RC.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE = 'APPR' GROUP BY RC.PERSON_ID ) A INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON C ON A.PERSON_ID = C.PERSON_ID GROUP BY C.PERSON_ID , C.FIRST_NAME ,C.LAST_NAME

SELECT PERSON_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, SUM([30 DAY DUE]) AS [30_DAY_DUE], SUM([60 DAY DUE]) AS [60_DAY_DUE], SUM([90 DAY DUE]) AS [90_DAY_DUE], SUM([MORE THAN 90 DAY DUE]) AS [MORE_THAN_90_DAY_DUE], SUM([30 DAY DUE] + [60 DAY DUE] + [90 DAY DUE] + [MORE THAN 90 DAY DUE]) AS [TOTAL_AMOUNT_DUE] FROM ( SELECT C.PERSON_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, GETDATE()) <= 30 THEN (TOTAL_PREMIUM_AMOUNT - ISNULL(F.PAID_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,0)) ELSE 0 END AS [30 DAY DUE], CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN (TOTAL_PREMIUM_AMOUNT - ISNULL(F.PAID_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,0)) ELSE 0 END AS [60 DAY DUE], CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN (TOTAL_PREMIUM_AMOUNT - ISNULL(F.PAID_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,0)) ELSE 0 END AS [90 DAY DUE], CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR, GETDATE()) > 90 THEN (TOTAL_PREMIUM_AMOUNT - ISNULL(F.PAID_PREMIUM_AMOUNT,0)) ELSE 0 END AS [MORE THAN 90 DAY DUE] FROM SGT_IBS_DETAIL A INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON C ON C.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND ISNULL(A.DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE, '') <> 'IGNR' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT D ON A.PERSON_ID = D.PERSON_ID AND A.PLAN_ID = D.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_INSURANCE_CONTRIBUTION F ON D.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = F.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND ( SUBSYSTEM_VALUE = 'IBSD' or SUBSYSTEM_VALUE = 'IBSP') AND (TRANSACTION_TYPE_VALUE = 'IBSP' OR TRANSACTION_TYPE_VALUE = 'IBAP') AND A.IBS_DETAIL_ID = F.SUBSYSTEM_REF_ID ) AS RAWDATA GROUP BY PERSON_ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME ORDER BY PERSON_ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME
select * from SGT_IBS_HEADER WHERE REPORT_TYPE_VALUE = 'ADJ' AND REPORT_STATUS_VALUE = 'RDPT'

select op.* from sgt_org_plan op(nolock) inner join sgt_organization o(nolock) on o.org_id = op.org_id and o.org_type_value='PRVD' where @batchDate between op.participation_start_date and isnull(op.participation_end_date,'01/01/2900') ORDER BY OP.ORG_PLAN_ID

select palh.* from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LIFE_HISTORY PALH WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sgt_person_account pa WITH (NOLOCK) ON PALH.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id inner join sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID where pa.plan_id = 13 and PALH.plan_participation_status_value='ENL2' AND PALH.plan_option_status_value = 'ENLD' and palh.life_insurance_type_value = 'REME' and @batchDate between PALH.effective_start_date and isnull(PALH.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') and PALH.effective_start_date <> isnull(PALH.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') --ignore same dated records and (ibs_flag = 'Y' or ibs_supplemental_flag = 'Y') and ((pa.plan_id in (9,12,16,17) AND (ibs_org_id IS NULL or (pa.plan_id in (9,12) and ibs_org_id is not null and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) > 0 and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) < 100)) AND ibs_supplemental_org_id IS NULL) OR (pa.plan_id = 13))

-- I am taking all the history records here since we need to get the health participation date for retiree by -- walking thru all the history. so, we must load all the history. select pagh.* from sgt_person_account pa WITH (NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID inner join sgt_person_account_ghdv pag(nolock) on pag.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id inner join sgt_person_account_ghdv_history pagh(nolock) on pagh.person_account_ghdv_id = pag.person_account_ghdv_id where pa.plan_id in (9,12,16,17,22) and PAGH.start_date <= @batchDate and --Ignore Future Dated Entries PAGH.start_date <> isnull(PAGH.end_date,'01/01/2900') and --Ignore same dated history records (ibs_flag = 'Y' or ibs_supplemental_flag = 'Y') and ((pa.plan_id in (9,12,16,17) AND (ibs_org_id IS NULL or (pa.plan_id in (9,12) and ibs_org_id is not null and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) > 0 and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) < 100)) AND ibs_supplemental_org_id IS NULL) OR (pa.plan_id = 13)) ORDER BY ISNULL(PAGH.END_DATE,'2900-01-01') DESC, PAGH.START_DATE DESC,PAGH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY_ID DESC

select palh.* from sgt_person_account pa WITH (NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID inner join sgt_person_account_life_history palh(nolock) on palh.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id where pa.plan_id = 13 and palh.plan_participation_status_value='ENL2' and palh.life_insurance_type_value = 'REME' and @batchDate between PALH.effective_start_date and isnull(PALH.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') and PALH.effective_start_date <> isnull(PALH.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') --ignore same dated history records and (ibs_flag = 'Y' or ibs_supplemental_flag = 'Y') and ((pa.plan_id in (9,12,16,17) AND (ibs_org_id IS NULL or (pa.plan_id in (9,12) and ibs_org_id is not null and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) > 0 and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) < 100)) AND ibs_supplemental_org_id IS NULL) OR (pa.plan_id = 13))

select * from sgt_org_plan op WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgt_organization o WITH(NOLOCK) on o.org_id = op.org_id and o.org_type_value = 'EMPL' where plan_id = 13 and @effectiveDate between participation_start_date and isnull(participation_end_date,'9999-12-31')

WITH PARENT(PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, plan_participation_status_value, effective_start_date, effective_end_date, RowRank) AS ( select PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, ltch.plan_participation_status_value, LTCH.effective_start_date, ltch.effective_end_date ,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY LTC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY LTC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, LTCH.effective_start_date DESC,isnull(ltch.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') DESC ) AS ROWRANK
from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION ltc Inner Join sgt_person_account_ltc_option_history LTCH on ltch.person_account_ltc_option_id = ltc.person_account_ltc_option_id where @billingPeriod between ltch.effective_start_date and isnull(ltch.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') and ltch.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2'
)
select pa.*,p.*,pl.*,pag.*,pal.*,pape.*,MED1.*,MED1.LOW_INCOME_CREDIT as idecLISAmount from sgt_person_account pa WITH (NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person_account_payment_election pape WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_account_id = pape.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID inner join sgt_person p WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.person_id= p.person_id inner join sgt_plan pl WITH (NOLOCK) on pa.plan_id = pl.plan_id left join ( Select PAG.* from sgt_person_account_ghdv pag(nolock) INNER jOIN sgt_person_account_ghdv_history pagh with(nolock) on pag.person_account_ghdv_id = pagh.person_account_ghdv_id where pagh.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2' AND ( ((pagh.dental_insurance_type_value is null OR pagh.dental_insurance_type_value = 'RT16') AND (pagh.health_insurance_type_value is null OR pagh.health_insurance_type_value in('RT09','RT12')) AND (pagh.vision_insurance_type_value is null OR pagh.vision_insurance_type_value ='RETR')) OR pagh.cobra_type_value is not null) AND @billingPeriod between pagh.start_date and isnull(pagh.end_date,'01/01/2900') AND pagh.START_DATE <> CASE WHEN pagh.END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN pagh.END_DATE ELSE '01/01/2900' END ) pag ON pag.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id left join ( Select Pal.* from sgt_person_account_life pal(nolock) Inner join sgt_person_account_life_history palh with(nolock) on pal.person_account_id = palh.person_account_id and palh.level_of_coverage_value = 'BASC' where palh.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2' and palh.life_insurance_type_value = 'REME' and @billingPeriod between palh.effective_start_date and isnull(palh.effective_end_date,'01/01/2900') AND palh.effective_start_date <> CASE WHEN palh.effective_end_date IS NOT NULL THEN palh.effective_end_date ELSE '01/01/2900' END ) pal on pal.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id left join ( Select MED.* from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_MEDICARE_PART_D_HISTORY MED(nolock) where MED.plan_participation_status_value = 'ENL2' AND @billingPeriod between MED.start_date and isnull(MED.end_date,'01/01/2900') AND MED.START_DATE <> CASE WHEN MED.END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN MED.END_DATE ELSE '01/01/2900' END --and MED.PERSON_ID = MED.MEMBER_PERSON_ID -- Only members should be selected ) MED1 ON MED1.person_account_id = pa.person_account_id
left join ( Select * from Parent where rowrank = 1 ) ltch on ltch.person_account_id = PA.person_account_id
where not exists(select 1 from sgt_ibs_detail id where id.ibs_header_id = @ibsHeaderID and pa.person_account_id = id.person_account_id) and pl.benefit_type_value='INSR' and (pa.end_date IS NULL OR pa.end_date >= @billingPeriod) and (ibs_flag = 'Y' or ibs_supplemental_flag = 'Y') and ( ( pa.plan_id in (12,16,17) AND (ibs_org_id IS NULL or (pa.plan_id = 12 and ibs_org_id is not null and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) > 0 and isnull(cobra_empr_share,0) < 100)) --AND ibs_supplemental_org_id IS NULL ) OR (pa.plan_id = 13 and ibs_org_id is null) OR (pa.plan_id = 9 and ibs_org_id is null) ) and pape.ibs_effective_date <= @billingPeriod AND (Pag.person_account_id is not null or Pal.person_account_id is not null or LTCH.person_account_id is not null or med1.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID is not null) order by pa.plan_id

--dont change the select order as created date from ibs detail logic is present in code SELECT * FROM SGT_IBS_DETAIL I WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION ELEC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ELEC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = I.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERACCT WITH(NOLOCK) ON ELEC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PERACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P WITH(NOLOCK) ON I.PLAN_ID = P.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACCT.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID WHERE I.IBS_HEADER_ID = @ibsHeaderID AND ISNULL(I.DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE,'') <> 'IGNR' ORDER BY I.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID,I.PROVIDER_ORG_ID

SELECT count(0) as total_record_count, isnull(sum(isnull(total_premium_amount,0.00)),0.00) as total_premium_amount FROM SGT_IBS_DETAIL I INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P ON I.PLAN_ID = P.PLAN_ID WHERE I.IBS_HEADER_ID = @ibsHeaderID AND ISNULL(I.DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE, '') <> 'IGNR'

SELECT Rem.Person_id, sum(isnull((REMITTANCE_AMOUNT - ( ISNULL(ALLOCATED_AMOUNT,0.00) + ISNULL(ALLOCATED_NEGATIVE_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT,0.00) + ISNULL(RECOVERY_PAMENT_AMOUNT,0.00)+ ISNULL( CASE WHEN REFUND_STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' THEN CASE WHEN OVERRIDDEN_REFUND_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL THEN ISNULL(OVERRIDDEN_REFUND_AMOUNT,0.00) ELSE ISNULL(COMPUTED_REFUND_AMOUNT,0.00) END ELSE 0.00 END ,0.00) ) ),0.00)) AS remittance_balance_forward FROM SGT_REMITTANCE REM WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_DEPOSIT DEP WITH(NOLOCK) ON DEP.DEPOSIT_ID = REM.DEPOSIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REMITTANCE_ID,SUM(0.00) AS ALLOCATED_AMOUNT FROM SGT_IBS_REMITTANCE_ALLOCATION GROUP BY REMITTANCE_ID ) AS ALLOC ON REM.REMITTANCE_ID = ALLOC.REMITTANCE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REMITTANCE_ID, SUM(ISNULL(PRINCIPLE_AMOUNT_PAID,0.00)+ ISNULL(AMORTIZATION_INTEREST_PAID,0.00)) AS RECOVERY_PAMENT_AMOUNT FROM SGT_PAYMENT_RECOVERY_HISTORY WHERE REMITTANCE_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY REMITTANCE_ID ) AS RECV ON REM.REMITTANCE_ID = RECV.REMITTANCE_ID WHERE DEP.STATUS_VALUE = 'APLD' AND (APPLIED_DATE > @MAXRUNDATE AND APPLIED_DATE <= GETDATE() ) AND REMITTANCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'IBSD' GROUP BY Rem.Person_Id

SELECT ACCT.PERSON_ID, SUM(ADJ.MONTHLY_AMOUNT) AS ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACCT WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN (SELECT PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID,STATUS_VALUE, SUM(MONTHLY_AMOUNT) AS MONTHLY_AMOUNT FROM SGT_PAYMENT_ELECTION_ADJUSTMENT ADJ WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE STATUS_VALUE IN ('IPAY','APRD') AND REPAYMENT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('3INS','INPY') GROUP BY PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID,STATUS_VALUE) ADJ ON ADJ.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = ACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PL WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACCT.PLAN_ID = PL.PLAN_ID WHERE PL.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE = 'INSR' AND ACCT.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL2','SUS3') GROUP BY ACCT.PERSON_ID

SELECT PAMH.* FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION PAPE WITH (NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PAPE.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_MEDICARE_PART_D_HISTORY PAMH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PAMH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE PA.PLAN_ID IN (9,12,16,17,22) AND PAMH.START_DATE <= @BATCHDATE AND --IGNORE FUTURE DATED ENTRIES PAMH.START_DATE <> ISNULL(PAMH.END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND --IGNORE SAME DATED HISTORY RECORDS (IBS_FLAG = 'Y' OR IBS_SUPPLEMENTAL_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((PA.PLAN_ID IN (9,12,16,17) AND (IBS_ORG_ID IS NULL OR (PA.PLAN_ID IN (9,12) AND IBS_ORG_ID IS NOT NULL AND ISNULL(COBRA_EMPR_SHARE,0) > 0 AND ISNULL(COBRA_EMPR_SHARE,0) < 100)) AND IBS_SUPPLEMENTAL_ORG_ID IS NULL) OR (PA.PLAN_ID = 13)) ORDER BY ISNULL(PAMH.END_DATE,'2900-01-01') DESC, PAMH.START_DATE DESC,PAMH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_MEDICARE_PART_D_HISTORY_ID DESC

--dont change the select order as created date from ibs detail logic is present in code SELECT * FROM SGT_IBS_DETAIL I WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION ELEC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ELEC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = I.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERACCT WITH(NOLOCK) ON ELEC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PERACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P WITH(NOLOCK) ON I.PLAN_ID = P.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON I.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID WHERE I.IBS_HEADER_ID = @ibsHeaderID AND ISNULL(I.DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE, '') <> 'IGNR' ORDER BY I.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID,I.PROVIDER_ORG_ID
select * from SGT_IBS_DETAIL with(NOLOCK) WHERE BILLING_MONTH_AND_YEAR >= @billingMonthAndYear AND PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @personAccountId AND ISNULL(DETAIL_STATUS_VALUE,'') IN ('VALD', 'REVW','PSTD')

SELECT COV_REF.* FROM SGT_ORG_PLAN_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE RATE WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF COV_REF WITH(NOLOCK) ON COV_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF_ID = RATE.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_COVERAGE_REF_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF RATE_REF WITH(NOLOCK) ON COV_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF_ID = RATE_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF_ID WHERE COV_REF.COVERAGE_CODE = @COVERAGE_CODE AND COV_REF.ORG_PLAN_GROUP_HEALTH_MEDICARE_PART_D_RATE_REF_ID = @RATE_REF_ID
